Moving Update
We've been looking at houses throughout the Greater Portland area since arriving in Maine. We didn't find anything within our budget to satisfy our wants, so we expanded our search radius and went to Waterville yesterday.We saw a house we loved. We made an offer last night. Our offer was accepted today. If everything goes well, we'll be Watervillains before the end of March! I'm so excited!#Moving #Maine
content:
